name: MeinKraft - Harris Memorial Run
description:
Mein Kraft
Harris Memorial Run

  • Trigger A and D
  • Keep balance via mouse

This game mechanics are (still) easy. So try to become the best strongmen in a dark past fantasy setting.

STILL EARLY ALPHA

Most of the stuff in this game isn't final. Even the game mechanic itself will be changed over time. So be aware that your highscore could be deleted when I make changes on the gameplay.

Gameplay changing ideas so far

  • Second minigame for lifting bomb
  • Third minigame for throwing bomb
  • Having to run multiple times
